I

IControlData - Interface in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.data
A general class for all classes used to store control-data.
Although the class itself does not provide any functionality (does not have attributes or methods), it is necessary to have a common class for the LinkedBlockingQueues that are used to send control-data-sets between the different modules / threads.
id - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.connection.Connection
static variable to ensure every connection has a unique id.
id - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.connection.ControlChangeQueueElement
the ID of the connection that is supposed to be in control of the specified data-type.
id - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network.Keywords
 
IData - Interface in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.data
 
identify() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network.ServerConnection
Sends identification information to the TCP-Server every 5 seconds and waits until the TCP-Server has sent back confirmation that the car has been successfully registered with it.
After a successful registration the car sends a list of its properties.
initialize(String[]) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.CarApplication
The method where all needed classes are being instantiated and corresponding threads are started.
If the RMCS does not have sensors, it will not try to establish a UART-connection with the STM32-board, hence there will not be an instance of STM32UartInterface.
If the RMCS does have sensors, there will be an instance of STM32UartInterface which will lead to the inability to use the bluetooth module and the RMCS will not be able to be controlled by a PS3-gamepad.
initialize(int) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.STM32SpiInterface
Initializes SPI Module 0 on the Raspberry Pi.
initialize(int) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.stm32.STM32UartInterface
Sets up the PIs serial interface to listen for incoming data, which is interpreted as SensorData and put on a Queue for further processing.
initializeGamepads() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad.GamepadManager
Searches for gamepads in the list of connected input-devides, instantiates GamepadConnections for each one and adds those to GamepadManager.gamepadConnections.
Sets GamepadManager.ready to true, to signal that all GamepadConnections are setup and ready.
inputStream - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.network.ServerConnection
The inputStream to read from the connected device.
ISensorDataListener - Interface in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.connection
By implementing this interface the user indicates that it is capable of receiving updates on new DistanceSensorData from the RMCS.
isReady() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.gamepad.GamepadManager
 
isStopped() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.data.DriveControlData
 
istrm_ - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.SyncPipe
 
IUI - Interface in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.rmcs.ui
Provides the ability for any UI that implements this interface to get updated about new information to be displayed.
